justification: The paper discusses the CPP signature as a neural correlate of evidence accumulation during decision-making, particularly noting its buildup before an overt response in their looming detection paradigm.
The study used participants' detection response times as the primary behavioral measure for assessing the detection of looming collision threats in their paradigm.
The optimum looming accumulator model (AV) with between-trial variability in input gain was used to model the accumulation of visual looming evidence in collision threat detection.
